clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Ataluren is approved for use by the European Medicines Agency to treat Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy in patients aged 5 years and older who are able to walk More specifically ataluren is used in the small group of patients whose disease is caused by a specific genetic defect called a nonsense mutation in the dystrophin gene

incompatibilities.description: The excretion of Succinic acid can be decreased when combined with Ataluren
